overview: Draken leads a band of vampires and mutant zombies on a bloodthirsty hunt for an elixir that holds the key to their immortality. In their desperate, final days they find it coursing through the veins of a young woman, Jesse, and once they find her they will stop for no man. Unless it's slayer Jack Cross, whose sole purpose in life is to see to the extinction of the entire vampire race.
title: Dark Angels 2: Bloodline
